content: ऊर्ध्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Erect, upright, above; °केश &c.; rising or tending upwards. {@--2@} Raised, elevated, erected; हस्तः, °पादः &c. {@--3@} High, superior, upper. {@--4@} Not sitting (<ab>opp.</ab> आसीन). {@--5@} Torn (as hair). {@--6@} Thrown up. --र्ध्वं Elevation, height. --र्ध्वं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Upwards, aloft, above. {@--2@} In the sequel (= उपरिष्टात्). {@--3@} In a high tone, aloud. {@--4@} Afterwards, subsequent to (with <ab>abl.</ab>); ते त्र्यहादूर्ध्वमाख्याय <ls>Ku. 6. 93</ls>; ऊर्ध्वं संवत्सरात् <ls>Ms. 9. 77</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 53</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 66</ls>; <ls>Bk. 18. 36</ls>; पितुरूर्ध्वं <ls>Ms. 9. 104</ls> after the father's death; अत ऊर्ध्वं henceforward, hereafter.
